trans-unit.source: Determines which properties are written out to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 判斷哪些屬性會寫出到組態檔中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode> enumeration values identify which properties are written out to a configuration file when calling the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SaveAs%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode>列舉值會識別哪一個屬性會寫出至組態檔時呼叫<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SaveAs%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Causes all properties to be written to the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 讓所有屬性寫入組態檔中。

trans-unit.source: This is useful mostly for creating information configuration files or moving configuration values from one machine to another.
trans-unit.target: 這對於建立資訊組態檔或將組態值從一部機器移到另一部機器會特別有用。

trans-unit.source: Causes only properties that differ from inherited values to be written to the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 只有讓與繼承值不同的屬性寫入組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Causes only modified properties to be written to the configuration file, even when the value is the same as the inherited value.
trans-unit.target: 只有讓修改過的屬性寫入組態檔，即使該值與繼承值相同時亦然。
